wikipedia_page.main: Roy Horobin (10 March 1935 – 29 August 2012) was an English, retired professional footballer who played as a forward. He made a total of 261 appearances (63 goals) in the Football League, for West Bromwich Albion, Notts County, Peterborough United and Crystal Palace. He also played non-league football for Weymouth.
